comments.author: Dave
comments.body: "More fun than a root canal, without that annoying novocaine flavor!" "Rock rash, cactus spines, snakebites, torn hamstrings, and a chance to meet the search and rescue guys... again. This run has it all!" "Be sure to sign the log in the PVC can at the top of the Crux... it help the coroner i.d. the remains." -Recent reviews from satisfied customers
